days.title: Arrival & Blue Lagoon
days.description: Landing in Keflavik and immediately heading to relax in the geothermal milky blue waters.

days.title: The Golden Circle
days.description: Driving the classic route to see the continental divide, exploding geysers, and the massive golden waterfall.

days.title: South Coast Waterfalls
days.description: Chasing waterfalls along the ring road. Walking behind Seljalandsfoss and seeing the black sand beach.
